title: Gabriele Pin
text:
Gabriele Pin (born 21 January 1962, in <a href="Vittorio%20Veneto">Vittorio Veneto</a>) is an Italian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach, and a former player. He is currently the assistant manager at <a href="Esteghlal%20F.C.">Esteghlal</a> Football Club in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>.
Pin became a coach after a long professional career as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. As a player, he won the <a href="1985%E2%80%9386%20Serie%20A">Scudetto</a> and <a href="1985%20Intercontinental%20Cup">Intercontinental Cup</a> with <a href="Juventus%20F.C.">Juventus</a> and the <a href="1992%E2%80%9393%20European%20Cup%20Winners%27%20Cup">UEFA Cup Winners' Cup</a>, the <a href="1994%E2%80%9395%20UEFA%20Cup">UEFA Cup</a> and the <a href="1993%20European%20Super%20Cup">UEFA Super Cup</a> with <a href="Parma%20F.C.">Parma</a>. As a coach he has served as assistant to <a href="Cesare%20Prandelli">Cesare Prandelli</a> in the latter's stints as manager.
On June 1st 2021, <a href="Farhad%20Majidi">Farhad Majidi</a>, <a href="Esteghlal%20F.C.">Esteghlal's</a> head coach , announced on his Instagram story that Gabriele is going to join him as an assistant of <a href="Esteghlal%20F.C.">Esteghlal F.C.</a>.
